psychological_arc.arc_description: Started trusting but learned caution through betrayal

story_summary: agent_007 participated in 12 social interactions. They tried cooperating 16.7% of the time, but were betrayed 2 times. These experiences made them more loss-averse (sensitivity: 2.01). Their trust in others diminished to 0.04.
key_insights: Experienced 2 betrayals but kept trying to cooperate
Developed increased sensitivity to losses through experience
